channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- ALP-AL00B, ALP-TL00B, BLA-AL00B, BLA-L09C, BLA-L29C
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- ALP-AL00B, ALP-TL00B, BLA-AL00B, BLA-L09C, BLA-L29C

item.title: CVE-2018-7910|2024-08-05T06:37:59.598Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- alp-al00b%2C%20alp-tl00b%2C%20bla-al00b%2C%20bla-l09c%2C%20bla-l29c
item.description: Some Huawei smartphones ALP-AL00B 8.0.0.118D(C00), ALP-TL00B 8.0.0.118D(C01), BLA-AL00B 8.0.0.118D(C00), BLA-L09C 8.0.0.127(C432), 8.0.0.128(C432), 8.0.0.137(C432), BLA-L29C 8.0.0.129(C432), 8.0.0.137(C432) have an authentication bypass vulnerability. When the attacker obtains the user's smartphone, the vulnerability can be used to replace the start-up program so that the attacker can obtain the information in the smartphone and achieve the purpose of controlling the smartphone.
